data.pageDescription: A collection of quick thoughts, reflections, and moments by Graziano Casto

entries.content: Feeling incredibly grateful after the KubeCon Maintainer Summit yesterday. The energy and dedication of this community is humbling. Huge thanks to Kubernetes SIGDocs for the unexpected recognition. Helping maintain the Kubernetes Blog is a privilege, and itâ€™s rewarding to support authors in sharing their work. Special shout-out to Tim Bannister for bringing me aboard the blog project! Thanks for the trust, everyone. Let's keep making things better, together. (And a huge thanks to William Rizzo for snapping this shot! I was caught in deep conversation right outside the room during this moment, so I owe him for capturing my recognition - I clearly almost missed my own celebration ðŸ˜…)
